an8.78:1.1: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi …pe…
an8.78:1.2: chahāvuso, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ attano, alaṃ paresaṃ.
an8.78:1.4: Idhāvuso, bhikkhu khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.78:1.8: kalyāṇavāco ca hoti kalyāṇavākkaraṇo, poriyā vācāya samannāgato vissaṭṭhāya anelagaḷāya atthassa viññāpaniyā;
an8.78:1.9: sandassako ca hoti samādapako samuttejako sampahaṃsako sabrahmacārīnaṃ.
an8.78:1.10: Imehi kho, āvuso, chahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ attano, alaṃ paresaṃ.
an8.78:2.1: Pañcahāvuso, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ attano, alaṃ paresaṃ.
an8.78:2.3: Idhāvuso, bhikkhu na heva kho khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.78:2.9: Imehi kho, āvuso, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ attano, alaṃ paresaṃ.
an8.78:3.1: Catūhāvuso, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ attano, nālaṃ paresaṃ.
an8.78:3.3: Idhāvuso, bhikkhu khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.78:3.9: Imehi kho, āvuso, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ attano, nālaṃ paresaṃ.
an8.78:4.1: Catūhāvuso, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ paresaṃ, nālaṃ attano.
an8.78:4.3: Idhāvuso, bhikkhu khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.78:4.5: no ca dhātānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthūpaparikkhitā hoti;
an8.78:4.6: no ca atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti;
an8.78:4.9: Imehi kho, āvuso, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ paresaṃ, nālaṃ attano.
an8.78:5.1: Tīhāvuso, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ attano, nālaṃ paresaṃ.
an8.78:5.3: Idhāvuso, bhikkhu na heva kho khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.78:5.9: Imehi kho, āvuso, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ attano, nālaṃ paresaṃ.
an8.78:6.1: Tīhāvuso, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ paresaṃ, nālaṃ attano.
an8.78:6.3: Idhāvuso, bhikkhu na heva kho khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.78:6.5: no ca dhātānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthūpaparikkhitā hoti;
an8.78:6.6: no ca atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti;
an8.78:6.9: Imehi kho, āvuso, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ paresaṃ, nālaṃ attano.
an8.78:7.1: Dvīhāvuso, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ attano, nālaṃ paresaṃ.
an8.78:7.3: Idhāvuso, bhikkhu na heva kho khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.78:7.4: no ca sutānaṃ dhammānaṃ dhāraṇajātiko hoti;
an8.78:7.9: Imehi kho, āvuso, dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ attano, nālaṃ paresaṃ.
an8.78:8.1: Dvīhāvuso, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ paresaṃ, nālaṃ attano.
an8.78:8.3: Idhāvuso, bhikkhu na heva kho khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.78:8.4: no ca sutānaṃ dhammānaṃ dhāraṇajātiko hoti;
an8.78:8.5: no ca dhātānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthūpaparikkhitā hoti;
an8.78:8.6: no ca atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti;
an8.78:8.7: kalyāṇavāco ca hoti kalyāṇavākkaraṇo, poriyā vācāya samannāgato vissaṭṭhāya anelagaḷāya atthassa viññāpaniyā;
an8.78:8.8: sandassako ca hoti samādapako samuttejako sampahaṃsako sabrahmacārīnaṃ.
an8.78:8.9: Imehi kho, āvuso, dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ paresaṃ, nālaṃ attano”ti.
